name: Audience
description: Intended audience for an item, i.e. the group for whom the item was created.
title: Audience

fields.name: audienceType
fields.title: Audience Type
fields.description: The target group associated with a given audience (e.g. veterans, car owners, musicians, etc.).

fields.title: Geographic Area
fields.description: The geographic area associated with the audience.
